    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void main()
      Main method for the UI - display all available movies and ask them to pick the cineplex to view If no cinema are available to show the movie for a cineplex, user will be asked to repick the cineplex Then, pass to the other methods to pick date, time and showcase ticket price
      void makeTransaction()
      Make the transaction with user's info
      void pickDateTimeCode(java.util.ArrayList<Cinema> mainCinemaList)
      Allow user to pick date and time for their viewing session
      void priceShowcase()
      Showcasing the price of the tickets Pass to method reserveSeat if the user want to reserve seats
      void reserveSeat()
      Allow user to reserve seats knowing the seating plan

      Set the cinema controller to a specific state

      Set the transaction controller to a specific state

      Show all available movies (with now showing or preview state)

      • main

        public void main()
        Main method for the UI - display all available movies and ask them to pick the cineplex to view If no cinema are available to show the movie for a cineplex, user will be asked to repick the cineplex Then, pass to the other methods to pick date, time and showcase ticket price

        Show all available movies (with now showing or preview state)

      • showAvailableSessions

        public java.util.ArrayList<Cinema> showAvailableSessions(java.lang.String cineplexName)
        Show all available sessions for a cineplex knowing the movie
        Parameters:
        cineplexName - Name of chosen cineplex
        Returns:
        a list of cinema that can show the movie for that cineplex
